## HTML5Lib License

Portions of this are based on html5lib's PHP version, which was a
sub-project of html5lib. The following is the list of contributors from
html5lib:

html5lib:

Copyright (c) 2006-2009 The Authors

Contributors:
James Graham - jg307@cam.ac.uk
